title: Ticket #3862: automatically detect Intel MIC resources
description:
This can be an inventory discovery script as outlined in #2905 or another mechanism, but the goal is to avoid the need for Condor administrators to manually configure Intel MIC resources and environment variables.

This will make life easier for administrators -- but equally importantly, it will establish a consistent naming scheme for users to address these resources.

[Note: #3861 is an equivalent ticket for NVIDIA/CUDA GPU resources.]
